definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

sentences.english: It is the power behind a 880 megawatt hydroelectric generating station.
sentences.chinese: 它是一座880百萬瓦水力發電站的主要動力來源。

sentences.english: Authorities attributed this phenomenon to the country lacks water resources, hydroelectric power stations.
sentences.chinese: 當局將此現象歸咎於該國水力發電站的水力資源缺乏。

sentences.english: Hydropower plants have long been a byword for clean energy.
sentences.chinese: 水力發電站長期以來被視爲清潔能源。
